ModMetaData.name: [AP] TumbleWeeds
ModMetaData.author: AlexisPopcorn
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds Tumbleweeds, Tumbleroots, and Snakeoil! Tumbleweeds and tumbleroots appear in arid biomes only, can go manhunter randomly around twice per day, but are very fragile and not so strong in combat.
